title: Russia Detains Olympic Goalie, Who Had Signed With the Philadelphia Flyers
description: Ivan Fedotov, who played for Russia’s Olympic hockey team, was accused of planning to evade military service, according to Russian news reports.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Ivan Fedotov was the Russian Olympic team’s starting goalie during the Beijing Winter Games in February. The team won a silver medal.
